posts.postText:
Yes, he's back. http://steamcommunity.com/id/aurax/

He told me that was his alt a week or so ago, and I totally forgot about it. But after that ban request, I remembered it was Storm, especially after it was a identical case of his prop kills.

Anyway, I guess it's up to Gash on what to do. I understand this is ban evasion, and would have perma'd him it if were anyone else, but I understand the well, 'significance'' of Storm to Gash.
